title: CSV data load
description: Upload a CSV directly to a map. This sample illustrates an easy way to load data to the map a CSV file. The CSV format has many advantages: standard, simple and fast efficient.

title: Dynamic JSON
description: A demo that fetches the major earthquakes and inject and the data dynamically on a map.

title: Go to locations
description: Simple example that shows how to control the location of the map.

title: Filter map
description: An example that shows how to filter the data on the map from an external component

title: Map Events
description: An example that shows how to listen events of the map

title: Select Events
description: An example that shows how to listen selection on layer and show features selected

title: Basemap Control
description: An example that shows how to change the basemap of the map

title: Print Control
description: An example that shows how to print the map

title: Create Marker
description: An example that shows how to Create a marker with svg

title: Create line/polygon
description: An example that shows how to Create line/polygon
